title: Linkin Park - Live in Las Vegas, 3-6-2008
description:
Here&#039;s another LPLive.net SBD release, the first of a two-night stand in Sin City. Thanks to nyvaleriec05 for this show.


Las Vegas, Nevada 
The Joint @ Hard Rock Hotel
6th March 2008 

Setlist:
01. Wake
02. Lying From You
03. Don&#039;t Stay 
04. Somewhere I Belong 
05. Papercut
06. Points Of Authority 
07. In Pieces
08. Numb
09. My December (Piano Version)
10. Breaking The Habit 
11. Crawling 
12. In The End
13. A Place For My Head
14. One Step Closer 
15. In Between
16. What I&#039;ve Done 
17. Bleed It Out
18. Faint 

Show Notes:
- The band shortened the setlist again because Chester was still sick. You can clearly see the changes, and see the band was going off of a Set S setlist. &#039;Given Up&#039; was not played, and &#039;Shadow Of The Day&#039; actually got taken out of the setlist for the first time ever (since it was added to the setlist). Still no &#039;Valentine&#039;s Day&#039; either. &#039;Points Of Authority&#039; was finally added back to the setlist. 
- &#039;It&#039;s Goin&#039; Down&#039; was over &#039;Points Of Authority&#039; and &#039;There They Go&#039; was over the outro.
